name: Red String Theory Demo
description:
Made for Spooktober 2022 VN Jam!

Trigger Warning for: severe written gore, written violence, written death and dying

This game contains loud noises.

Serena wakes up in a strange place without her memories.  When her memories return, she's left with more confusion than answers. Can she escape with her sanity? 

This demo contains the following:

- ~800 words (~5 mins of gameplay)

- and a lot of pain

-the best is yet to come!

Thanks to all the following people for making this possible!

  • Joex (Co-Director)
  • onigiri (@onigiri#7600) (Co-writer)

  • opheliaveu (Logo art)
  • D.ray (SFX and VO artist)

  • Mari Chavez(Serena VA)
  • Daniel Doan (Adisa VA)
  • +1 others!
